resources.string: If you disable this option in Queue station, a Bumpbar is required to bump the order off Queue display.
Cannot access NAND FLASH to save/load data, go to System Setting – Storage – NAND FLASH and click “Mount SD card” to mount the NAND FLASH.
Move finished orders to front of queue
If item goes to multiple stations and partial stations bump this item, Expo shows partial finish mark
Expo cannot bump the order unless all its prep station bump the items
